job.title: Senior Data Scientist - Machine Learning

compensation to leaders in their industry analyze internal compensation data and make the right adjustments then visually communicate compensation to their employees were building the worlds largest tools domains and stakeholdersltbrgtltbrgtat pave we have one of the worlds most interesting datasets seriously this is every data scientists dream we have almost every characteristic you could want from compensation characteristics to demographic characteristics to location data to well anything you could want analyze oh did we mention it was clean if you said yes to the above come help us make
